sections.heading: costs of the mediation process shall be paid by the parties
sections.text: If the court orders the parties to mediation, the costs to the parties shall be charged according to a sliding fee scale as established by the State Court Administrator.SourceLaws 2007, LB554, ยง 23.

43-2942.Costs.

The costs of the mediation process shall be paid by the parties. If the court orders the parties to mediation, the costs to the parties shall be charged according to a sliding fee scale as established by the State Court Administrator.

SourceLaws 2007, LB554, ยง 23.
